name: Bank Account
guideline:
Code: 11020x-0y x=bank_count, y=account_count
Name : Bank_name Last_4_digits (Your_callable_name)
 - example: 110201 | Kbank 1123 (Salary Account)

name: E-wallet
guideline:
Code: 11030xn
Name : Bank_name Last_4_digits (Your_callable_name)
 - example: 110301 | Paypal

name: Debit Card
guideline:
Code: 11040x
Name : Card_name Provider
 - example: 110401 | YouTrip Visa

name: Account Receivable
guideline:
Code: 11050x
Name : Person_name
 - example: 110501 | Mike
Description : credit_limit, agreed_duration, penalty_clause, blacklist_flag

name: Workplace AW
guideline:
Code: 11060x
Name : Workplace_name
 - example : 110601 | SuperHotel
Description : payment_date, to_account

name: Credit Card
guideline:
Code: 21010x
Name : Card_name Provider
 - example: 210101 | SCB_Platinum JCB
